page.title: 14CUSTOMS
page.content: My favourite {Playground games }are French skipping and Red Rover.{French {skipping}is a girls game really. Two people have to get a long loop of elastic and stand facing one another with the elastic round their ankles. You have to jump the lines. If you tread on the lines of elastic you are out and it is the next persons go. You have to do it all on anklesy, kneesy, and thighsy and then anklesy, hopsy, linesy, thinsy and fatsy. In{Red Rover}you have two sides of five or more. One side calls out a persons name and they have to run over to your side and you join hands and he or she has to try and get through your hands. If they do not get through they stay on your side. If they get through they take one of your side to their side.
